document.full_text: jeremy n. morlock, one of five army soldiers accused of killing three afghan civilians for sport, is expected to plead guilty and agree to testify against other defendants at a court-martial hearing.
document.title: soldier is expected to plead guilty in afghan killings case
lines_and_colors: jeremy n. morlock, one of five army soldiers accused of killing three afghan civilians for sport, is expected to plead guilty and agree to testify against other defendants at a court-martial hearing.
